lead_paragraph: Brazil would prefer Neymar to play in the Olympics rather than at the Centenary Copa America this year and will be working with both the player and his club Barcelona to make it happen, coach Dunga said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Boss Dunga Wants Neymar at Olympics
headline.main: Brazil Boss Dunga Wants Neymar at Olympics

snippet: Brazil would prefer Neymar to play in the Olympics rather than at the Centenary Copa America this year and will be working with both the player and his club Barcelona to make it happen, coach Dunga said on Tuesday....
